review: I was taken away by the humbleness and attention to detail. I was explained about the procedure and best resolution possible to my tooth condition. The ambience of the clinic has a mesmerizing and calming effect which truly represents Dr Modi's true gentleman ship and his great skill as a great doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
The enviornment is quite peaceful and comfortable given the pain the person undergoes in dental treatment. Doctors are quite friendly and provides comfort to the patient. Doctor Manu Modi ** ***** ************* *** is able to articulate the solution to the problem

Areas of improvements :
Waiting time is always more than expected and the treatment is little expensive . I think you should provide some discounts to the old patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

Regarding the doctor I can only say that it is like showing light to Sun 
*** **** ****** ****** ** *** **** 
The soft spokenness and a personal touch is what heals the patient half of the disease 
The expediting tecards to medical field of Dental is unmatchable 
God bless !!!!

review:
Reminding appointment and after reaching the clinic very little waiting time. He is master of his work and wants to do perfectly, first to his satisfaction and then to the satisfaction of the patient. 
Wonderful friendly person and a highly qualified doctor. I shall definitely recommend to others.
